## About Me  

I am an **Environmental Scientist and Remote Sensing specialist (Ph.D.)**. I am a PhD student at the **[Phylomigration Lab](https://www.phylomigrationlab.com/)** at the **[Barcelona Botanical Institute (IBB)](https://www.ibb.csic.es/ca/institut_/)**.  

My interests involve the use of **satellite remote sensing data** to track Earth's ecological processes, ranging from **Land Cover change** to **tracking migratory insects**.  

Despite working with data acquired **hundreds of kilometers above us**, I love to step firmly on the ground, observing and monitoring biodiversity. Whether for planning research projects or enjoying a **birdwatching session**, feel free to **[contact me](mailto:roger.lopez@ibb.csic.es)**! ðŸ˜Š
